item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in and around New Haven.

To continue with our outdoor summer happy hours...

This week's location is: Lenny's

Lenny's is one of the CT shoreline's best local watering holes. A great seafood restaurant with a huge patio overlooking the Sybil Creek tidal marsh and osprey nesting areas.

Specials for the NHC include:
All Beers (bottles or drafts) - $3.50
Wine - $4.50
Mixed Drinks - $5.00

Lobster Roll - not on special, but without a doubt the best I have had in CT!!!

Special thanks to fellow NHC member Veronica for setting up this weeks happy hour for the group.

Contact info: Veronica (her number is in the RSVP)

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Lenny's
